explains: n. 专题著作，专题论文

sentences.en: The document is known as an "audio monograph."
sentences.cn: 该文件被称为“音频著作”。

sentences.en: A monograph on the subject might be forthcoming.
sentences.cn: 关于本主题的一个专论即将推出。

sentences.en: The revised monograph for the new ORS formula will be published in the fourth edition of the International Pharmacopoeia.
sentences.cn: 修订的口服补液盐新配方专论将在国际药典第四版中发表。
